teletype.description: launch a terminal streaming session in oorja.
examples:
[94m$ oorja teletype[39m
will prompt to choose streaming destination - existing room or create a new one.

[94m$ oorja teletype https://oorja.io/rooms?id=foo[39m
will stream to the room specified by secret link, you must have joined the room before streaming.

[94m$ oorja teletype -m https://oorja.io/rooms?id=foo[39m
Will also allow room participants to write to your terminal!

shell.name: shell
shell.description: shell to use. e.g. bash, fish

multiplex.name: multiplex
multiplex.description: allows room users to WRITE TO YOUR SHELL. Can be helpful or painful. Off by default
